Owlhawk:  Let's go back to the base.  I can't scan in
Beast Mode and with so much unstable energon in the
area being boosted by this stuff I better not chance
going to robot mode.

He flies back toward the base.

--- Nic <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Katya: Aff. I am not a scientist, but I think that
> if we are able to 
> control it in some ways, we might produce energy
> enough to power the 
> whole base, and maybe build around it.
> 
> A small door at the back of her neck opens,
> revealing what had once 
> been a cockpit, but was now much too small to
> accomodate anyone. She 
> places the piece of energon carefull in it.
> 
> Katya: Do we go back to base or do we need to
> investigate some more 
> over here?
>
